name: mango
description:
A developer created a testing program that is continuously writing to a log file /var/log/bad.log and filling up the disk.
You can check for example with tail -f /var/log/bad.log.
This program is no longer needed. Find it and terminate it.
This scenario was copied from https://github.com/fduran/sadservers/tree/main/scenarios/scenario-1-saintjohn
